ModMetaData.name: GlowRose
ModMetaData.author: Denerose
ModMetaData.description: Adds plantable glowing plants for light and decoration, a rose with pink glow, a blueish glowberry (which produces glowing pretty fruit), and a darklily (darklight variation). Darklily and Glowroses can be planted in the ground or decorative planters. Glowberry can be planted in ground or hydroponics beds.
